Class SO3_1Group

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.mathematics.algebra.groups.SO3_1Group
All Implemented Interfaces:
Group<Matrix<Real>>, Magma<Matrix<Real>>, Monoid<Matrix<Real>>, Set<Matrix<Real>>
public class SO3_1Group extends Object implements Group<Matrix<Real>>
The group of all linear transformations of Minkowski space that preserve the spacetime interval ds²=-c²dt²+dx²+dy²+dz². Elements are represented as 4x4 matrices.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)

      public Matrix<Real> identity()
      Description copied from interface: Monoid
      Returns the identity element of this monoid.

      Satisfies: e ∗ a = a ∗ e = a for all a.

    • inverse

      public Matrix<Real> inverse(Matrix<Real> element)
      Description copied from interface: Group
      Returns the inverse of the given element.

      For element a, returns a⁻¹ such that: a ∗ a⁻¹ = a⁻¹ ∗ a = e (identity).

      Specified by:
      inverse in interface Group<Matrix<Real>>
      Parameters:
      element - the element to invert
      Returns:
      the inverse element
